mapper.select: select * from Movie order by mo_recommendation DESC
mapper.insert: insert into Movie(mo_number, mo_title, mo_director, mo_actor, mo_genre, mo_age, mo_playTime, mo_openDate, mo_recommendation, mo_fileName) values (movie_seq.nextval, #{mo_title}, #{mo_director}, #{mo_actor}, #{mo_genre}, #{mo_age}, #{mo_playTime}, #{mo_openDate}, #{mo_recommendation}, #{mo_fileName})
mapper.update: update Movie set mo_title=#{mo_title}, mo_director=#{mo_director}, mo_actor=#{mo_actor}, mo_genre=#{mo_genre}, mo_age=#{mo_age}, mo_playTime=#{mo_playTime}, mo_openDate=#{mo_openDate}, mo_recommendation=#{mo_recommendation}, mo_fileName=#{mo_fileName} where mo_number = #{mo_number}
